summary: A cable alerts all COS (Chiefs of Station) and COB (Chiefs of Base) about the upcoming 46th anniversary of the founding of the Soviet State Security Organization (KGB) on December 20, traditionally celebrated by KGB functionaries, and instructs them to mount unilateral surveillance and/or alert liaison services to the event.
summary_one_paragraph: This secret cable, sent from the Director to all Chiefs of Station and Chiefs of Base, informs them that December 20 marks the 46th anniversary of the founding of the Soviet State Security Organization, a date traditionally observed by KGB functionaries worldwide. The cable instructs addressees to initiate unilateral surveillance and/or alert liaison services as appropriate, as attendance at these gatherings has previously aided in identifying individuals and confirming tentative identifications.
title: Book Cable (EE-GKLOT): KGB Anniversary Surveillance
